interpretation: The "persevering face" emoji shows a frowning face with a bead of sweat on its forehead, indicating stress and struggle. This card represents the need to keep pushing through difficult times, even when it feels overwhelming. It is a reminder that success often requires perseverance and determination, and that challenges can be overcome with patience and hard work. Associated keywords include persistence, resilience, endurance, and determination. When this card appears in a reading, it may suggest that the querent is facing obstacles but has the strength to keep going. It may also indicate that the querent needs to stay focused and not give up, even when the going gets tough. Overall, the "persevering face" card is a symbol of strength and resilience, encouraging the querent to keep moving forward despite the challenges they may face.
